SEARCH
Package grafioschtrader.repository

Interface HoldSecurityaccountSecurityJpaRepository.ITransactionSecuritySplit

All Known Implementing Classes:
HoldSecurityaccountSecurityJpaRepository.TransactionSecuritySplit
Enclosing interface:
HoldSecurityaccountSecurityJpaRepository
public static interface HoldSecurityaccountSecurityJpaRepository.ITransactionSecuritySplit
Projection interface for buy/sell transaction events and security split events associated with a specific security cash account and security.

Maps to a native SQL query that unifies:

  • ACCUMULATE (buy) and REDUCE (sell) transactions, with factorUnits = Â±(units * assetInvestmentValue_2)
  • Security split events, with factorUnits = (to_factor / from_factor)
Results are ordered by the event timestamp (tsDate).

  • Method Details

    • getIdTransaction

      Integer getIdTransaction()
      The unique identifier of the transaction event.

      If the record is a split event, this value will be null.

      Returns:
      the transaction ID or null for split events

    • getIdSecuritycurrency

      Integer getIdSecuritycurrency()
      The ID of the Security entity associated with this event.
      Returns:
      the securitycurrency ID (always refers to a Security)

    • getTsDate

      LocalDateTime getTsDate()
      The timestamp of the event.

      For transactions, this corresponds to transaction_time; for splits, split_date.

      Returns:
      the event date and time as LocalDateTime

    • getFactorUnits

      Double getFactorUnits()
      Computed units factor for the event.
      • For transactions: Â±(units * assetInvestmentValue_2), positive for buys, negative for sells.
      • For splits: split ratio (to_factor / from_factor).
      Returns:
      the factor units for this event

    • getIdTransactionMargin

      Integer getIdTransactionMargin()
      The identifier of the margin transaction, when applicable.

      Only populated for margin-related transactions; null for split events.

      Returns:
      the margin transaction ID or null if not applicable

    • getCurrency

      String getCurrency()
      The currency code of the underlying security for transaction events.

      Null for split-only events.

      Returns:
      the ISO currency code or null if not applicable
